subject: RE: [junit] Servlet Testing
msgSnippet: Both HttpUnit and Cactus are excellent tools. Cactus is the more unit of the two, and allows you to test individual methods and objects that depend on
messageBody:
Both HttpUnit and Cactus are excellent tools. Cactus is the more "unit" of the two, and allows you to test individual methods and objects that depend on container objects (such as ServletRequest and Session). HttpUnit lets you simulate a browser and validate the HTML returned from the server. We use both in our projects. For more info on both these frameworks, you can take a look at:
 


Java Tools for Extreme Programming: Mastering Open Source Tools, including Ant, JUnit, and Cactus
info:
http://www.rickhightower.com/JavaXPToolkit/

buy:

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/047120708X/
